pageTitle: Hagure Yuusha no Estetica - Hagure Yūsha no Estetica Wiki
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {49665=The anime was adapted by Arms Corporation, directed by Rion Kujou, and had began its airing on July 6, 2012. "Realization", the opening theme, was by Faylan. The ending theme "Ai no Sei de Nemurenai" by Aki Misato.}
